{"id":1175615467,"question_id":3262,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1707964023,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1175615467/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Polygon With the Largest Perimeter","memory":"63 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long largestPerimeter(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        long[] presum = new long[len];\n\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            presum[i] = i==0? nums[0] : nums[i]+presum[i-1];\n        }\n\n        for(int i=len-1; i>0; i--){\n\n            if(nums[i]<presum[i-1]){\n                return presum[i];\n            }\n\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-polygon-with-the-largest-perimeter","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
